sect4.title: lsdev
sect4.para: lsdev gathers information about your computer's installed hardware from the interrupts, ioports and dma files in the /proc directory, thus giving you a quick overview of which hardware uses what I/O addresses and what IRQ and DMA channels.

sect4.title: procinfo
sect4.para: procinfo gathers some system data from the /proc directory and prints it nicely formatted on the standard output device.

sect4.title: socklist
sect4.para: is a Perl script that gives you a list of all open sockets, enumerating types, port, inode, uid, pid, fd and the program to which it belongs.
